name: Organs Without Bodies: A Mothership RPG Low-Fi Zine
name_original: Organs Without Bodies: A Mothership RPG Low-Fi Zine
description:
Organs Without Bodies: A Mothership RPG Low-Fi Zine

CW: organ harvesting, murder

Some people need them, and everyone has them, yet very few know how to competitively facilitate the trade of bio-assets on an open market.

This manual will change that, providing you the keys to knowledge you need to succeed, including potential clientele, proper acquisition technique, and even a guide to best practices for bio-asset transportation and storage.

Created for the 2022 Mothership lo-fi zine jam, voices of the void, Organs Without Bodies is a player facing zine ready to seamlessly add an element of economic horror to your campaign.

Writer: Owen O’Donnell(Am I Cool Yet?) https://twitter.com/AmICoolYet14

Artist: Lettuce https://twitter.com/ZODIOLESTES_

My other project, Year of the Rat: https://am-i-cool-yet.itch.io/year-of-the-rat-a-mothership-adventure
